text: jis waqt moosa ne apni khaom se kaha ke Allah ke wo ehsaanaath yaad karo jo us ne tum par kiye hai jab ke us ne tumhe ferauniyo se najaath di jo tumhe bade dukh pahonchate thein, tumhare ladko ko qatl karte thein aur tumhari ladkiyo ko zinda chohd te thein, us mein tumhare rub ki taraf se tum par bahuth badi aazmaayish thi
